backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining data types, authorization mixins, storage mixins, maps for benches, documents, components, history, and user profiles, plus several query methods including test bench retrieval.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a no-op migration that returns the old actor state as the new state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest listing feature descriptions, related files, components, and test IDs for i18n and language‑persistence work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style definitions with OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global CSS resets.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up tanstack router trees, authentication-protected layouts, theme and i18n providers, and mounts the application with React Query and an error boundary.
Admin-only access gate that checks admin status and displays localized loading or access‑denied messages.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary showing an alert with reload option when an unhandled error occurs.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures the backend actor is initialized, showing a spinner or connection error before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that redirects unauthenticated users to sign‑in and shows inline login UI when needed.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: A generic draggable list component that renders items with drag handlers and visual feedback for reordering.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: A hook managing list reordering logic using drag events, tracking item order and dragged index.
The main app layout with navigation, admin links, theme toggle, and user menu including sign-out handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows floating buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: A tag input allowing one entity selection with suggestions, add/remove behavior, and validation state.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid selector for choosing predefined avatar images with visual highlighting.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar from predefined or custom sources with cache-busting support and size options.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: A button toggling between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it updates.
Zustand store providing a timestamp-based cache buster for avatar image refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Manages the saved dashboard chart type preference synced to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login and stored identity lifecycle.
Periodically calls the backend to update the user's last-seen timestamp when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as test benches, user profiles, roles, and preferences.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context that initializes and persists the user's language preference using backend and local storage.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages and helper functions for language lookup and validation.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Declares translation key types for all UI strings used across the application.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exposes a translation hook that retrieves localized strings based on the current language context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the Admin dashboard with tabbed panels for benches, documents, and users.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays all test benches and provides UI for deleting benches with confirmation dialogs.
Lists all documents for admins with loading state and allows downloading each document using a handler.
Displays the current user's profile, expiration settings, and dashboard layout with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a bench, including components, documents, history, and supports editing, removing, and duplicating components.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Displays a searchable list of benches with photos and supports adding a new bench via a modal.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal form for creating a new bench, handling photo upload, metadata input, document categories, components, validation, and optional component duplication.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Provides a table UI for adding, editing, removing, and duplicating bench components with expiration status computation.
Manages document upload, versioning, association, and deletion for a bench across predefined categories.
Displays a sorted list of bench history events with user info, timestamps, and optional details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallbacks using an ExternalBlob URL.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: Handles selection of document categories and uploading files with version metadata for each category.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog allowing a component to be duplicated to multiple other benches with selection and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal form for editing a test bench, handling field validation, photo upload, and submitting updates.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag input component allowing adding, removing, and selecting tags with suggestion filtering.
Placeholder page describing planned features for creating a new bench with documents, tags, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Pie chart card showing counts of components by expiration status based on thresholds.
Bar chart card displaying per‑bench counts of components grouped by expiration status.
Bar chart grouping component expirations into date ranges such as past, 0–30 days, and beyond.
Pie chart summarizing documents by category with fallback for unknown categories.
Bar or line chart showing monthly counts of component expirations over time.
Builds bar or line charts showing expired components per bench based on thresholds and expiration status.
Calculates component health percentages and displays them using progress bars for OK, expiring soon, and expired items.
Defines a draggable dashboard statistics section with stat cards and charts, restoring order from storage or defaults.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads dashboard data, computes component statuses, manages section ordering, and renders various statistic and chart components.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile editing including thresholds, avatar selection, language, validation, and saving preferences.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Displays a login screen using Internet Identity, handling errors and redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Provides a map of avatar IDs to image paths and helpers to retrieve avatar paths and IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads files as ExternalBlob objects with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts a default bench photo into an ExternalBlob for use as a placeholder.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides a helper to fetch bytes from an ExternalBlob and trigger a browser file download.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Converts unknown error values into readable messages with fallbacks for various error shapes.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration-threshold settings using localStorage, profile overrides, and computes expiration states.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a simple unique string ID using timestamp and random data.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Applies deterministic text cleanups to bench descriptions, including normalization and abbreviation fixes.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Filters test benches by matching query terms against bench fields and tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates email, domain, agile code, semantic versions, and URLs with simple rule checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: Defines TypeScript compiler settings for Node-related build files.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, env var plugins, path aliases, dev server proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and i18n requirements for instant UI language updates.
